text: Ani tumhi tya lokanna, tya vasticya rahivasanci, ji samudracya javala vasali hoti, tya velaci avastha vicara, jevha te sanivaracya divasababata maryadece ullanghana karita hote. Vastavika tyancya sanivaracya divasi tyanna mase ughadapane tyancyasamora yeta ani jevha sanivaraca divasa nase tevha (mase) tyancya samora yeta nasata. Amhi asa prakare tyanci kasoti gheta hoto. Ya karanastava ki te ajna bhanga karita hote
